summary: Documentary showing the history of the world-famous Statue of Liberty in New York harbor, the impact it still has on people and the state of liberty as a personal and political concept in America in 1985.

Linowitz|Salvatore Musso|The Vindmans
keywords: reexamination|political philosophy|declaration of independence|reference to grover cleveland|immigrant
title: The Statue of Liberty
